alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; Gwinnett; Henry; Newton; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockdale, DeKalb, southern Cobb, northeastern Douglas, southern Gwinnett, northwestern Henry, Walton, southwestern Fulton, northern Clayton and northern Newton Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Harbin to Chamblee to Hiram, and moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Marietta, Douglasville, Lawrenceville, Decatur, Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Jonesboro, City of South Fulton, Peachtree Corners, Sandy Springs, Smyrna, Dunwoody, East Point, Stockbridge, Union City, Forest Park, Snellville, and Riverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Clayton; Cobb; DeKalb; Douglas; Gwinnett; Henry; Newton; North Fulton; Rockdale; South Fulton
